column4: i have a question. there is a document on my desktop and i dont know how to open it. it is .doc and it wont openin text editor
i have that. which one do i use?
thanks im goign to try it
if the .doc was created with MS Word, u'll be able to open it in OOo writer
arghh i dont have openoffice installed in dapper yet. packages right?
arghh. my sister doesnt have the same adminstration as me. she doesnt have the package manager. how come
different versions of Ubuntu maybe? or different install sets...
wait installed dapper on my thing yesterday (ketetha) but does that mean i ahve to install it on yeri's too?
it doenst work. im goign to go back to ketetha and see if she has the same rights as me and stuff and install it there byee
well... maybe you have a different ubuntu version (and thus repos) and OOo package name is different...
